def has_bowls_or_plates_in_sink(sink:item):
    # Function to check if there are bowls or plates in a specific sink
    symbol has_bowls_or_plates=exists o: item : (is_bowl(o) or is_plate(o)) and inside(o, sink)
    return has_bowls_or_plates

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists sink: item : is_sink(sink) and has_bowls_or_plates_in_sink(sink):
            # If we have already found the sink with bowls or plates, we can directly approach it
            bind sink: item where:
                is_sink(sink) and has_bowls_or_plates_in_sink(sink)
            achieve close_char(char, sink)

        else:
            # Check all sinks in the scene that have not been visited
            foreach sink: item:
                if is_sink(sink) and not visited(sink):
                    observe(sink,"Check if there are any bowls or plates in the sink")
